document.full_text: baidu inc, china's largest search engine, will shut its online e-commerce store, youa, and migrate its users to other platforms, it said on thursday.
document.title: china's baidu to shut e-commerce platform
lines_and_colors: baidu inc, china's largest search engine, will shut its online e-commerce store, youa, and migrate its users to other platforms, it said on thursday.
